values: 投掷；抛出；投（钓线）；投票；投射（光、影）；分配角色；选派演员；浇铸；铸造；抛弃；转向；计算；估算；预测；把（思想、疑虑等）投向；把（目光）投向；使（眼神）一瞥；呕吐；（蛇）蜕（皮）
铸件；塑件；模子；铸造品；（一出戏剧或一部电影的）全体演员；投掷；投射；外观；外貌；形状；特征；轻微斜视

synonym.mean: 投掷，抛；铸件，铸型；演员阵容；脱落物
投，抛垂钓鱼钩；计算，把几个数字加起来

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 铸造；铸件；投掷；角色分配
铸造；投掷；投向；选派演员；扔掉（cast的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用力投掷，或因感情激动而粗暴地或漫无目的地扔东西。
普通用词，使用广泛，仅指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
常可与throw互换，指迅速扔出一个重量较轻的物体。
指无什么目的地、轻轻地、随意地掷或扔，所扔掷的东西一般都比较轻。
通常指用力投掷，动作迅猛，所投掷的距离也较远。
指随意地、轻轻地掷或扔，侧重方向性和有明确的目标。

word_group.brief_definition: 怀疑, 质疑, 对…生疑
抛弃, 扔到一边, 废除
四处寻找；设法；反复思索
撒开大网(搜寻时考虑面要宽)
收针；解缆放船；放开猎狗；估计版面篇幅；被解开系缆
事已成定局, 木已成舟, 无法改变
收针；解缆放船；放开猎狗；估计版面篇幅；被解开系缆
在岸上沉淀某物；把…冲上岸；把数字加起来

bilingual.source: They cast a statue using a mold.
bilingual.target: 他们用模具铸造了一个雕像。

bilingual.source: They decided to cast the sculpture in bron.
bilingual.target: 他们决定用青铜铸造这座雕塑。

bilingual.source: The craftsmen cast metal parts in the factory.
bilingual.target: 工匠们在工厂里铸造金属零件。

bilingual.source: He learned how to cast iron in the workshop.
bilingual.target: 他在车间里学会了如何铸造铁器。

bilingual.source: The jeweler uses moulds to cast intricate designs.
bilingual.target: 珠宝商使用模具来铸造复杂的设计。

bilingual.source: The process requires high temperatures to cast the metal.
bilingual.target: 这个过程需要高温来铸造金属。

bilingual.source: The artist used silicone molds to cast the sculptures.
bilingual.target: 艺术家使用硅胶模具来铸造雕塑。

bilingual.source: The workers at the foundry start their day early to cast metal parts.
bilingual.target: 铸造厂的工人们很早就开始他们的一天来铸造金属零件。

bilingual.source: Parts made of forged steel are usually stronger than cast ones.
bilingual.target: 锻钢的零件通常比铸造的更坚固。

bilingual.source: Cast stainless steel body and investment cast yoke.
bilingual.target: 铸造不锈钢阀体和熔模铸造轭架.

list.abstract: 中国科学技术协会（China Association for Science and Technology）成立于1958年9月，是中国科学技术工作者的群众组织，是中国共产党领导下的人民团体，是党和政府联系科学技术工作者的桥梁和纽带，是国家推动科学技术事业发展的重要力量；是国家科教工作领导小组、中央精神文明建设指导委员会和中央人才工作协调小组成员单位。 中国科学技术协会由全国学会、协会、研究会，地方科学技术协会及基层组织组成；地方科学技术协会由同级学会和下一级科学技术协会及基层组织组成。
CAST，英语单词，[with obj., usu. with adverbial of direction]throw (something) forcefully in a specified direction.猛扔，掷，投，抛的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: Otherwise, you'd better hope the sediments around you harden while your bones decay away and another sediment or mineral fills in the spaces your bones leave behind, creating a perfect cast of your skeleton.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不然，你最好盼着在你骨骼渐逝时，你周边的沉积物硬化有别的沉积物或矿物填充你骨骼留下的空间，铸造成完美的骨骼造型。

yingyinNormal.en: The children are all doing drawings on Pedro's plaster cast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子们都想在佩德罗的石膏上面画画。

yingyinNormal.en: I broke my leg and they put it in this plaster cast. The plaster cast helps Pedro's leg get better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的腿骨折了，然后医生就帮我打了个石膏。石膏能帮助佩德罗的腿恢复得更快。

yingyinNormal.en: You may cast your votes. No. No, obviously not. This is crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以投票了。不同意，肯定不同意，这简直不可思议。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this the same spoon was in my cast? You know what? This one is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是刚刚你拿来帮我搔痒的汤匙吗？你知道吗？这支才是。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you are. But I'm still surprised you weren't cast as the baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，但我还是真惊讶苏菲居然没让你扮婴儿耶稣。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't care if the entire cast of Eight Is Enough comes out of there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生出《八宝喜事》全剧组来都没关系！

yingyinNormal.en: And then they're gonna go to their little cast parties and he's gonna try to undermine me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后去参加剧组派对，他会设法中伤我。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes. Hello, everyone. Pedro Pony is back. Oh, hello, Pedro. Where is your plaster cast?
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，是的。你们大家好啊。小马佩德罗回来了。你好，佩德罗。你的石膏到哪里去了？

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. I presume the tapes are in my office. Your office? Cast your mind back. It used to be yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是。我想录像应该在我办公室吧。你的办公室？回想一下。那里原本是你的。

yingyinNormal.en: I grazed my knee and I got a plaster too. Wow, do you want to draw on my plaster cast? Yes, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我摔破了我的膝盖，我这里还贴了张创可贴呢。哇，你们想要画画吗？可以画在我的石膏上。是的，我想。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. Thank you. We will now vote on the resolution. Ladies and gentlemen, please cast your vote.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢各位。谢谢，现在就方案进行表决，女士们，先生们，请投票。

yingyinNormal.en: Say Ross, when you picture Phoebe living on the street, is she surrounded by the entire cast of Annie?
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，你以为菲比是被《小孤女安妮》的整个剧组包围着吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I've got a bit of an itch. Even if your leg is itching, we can't take the cast off until your leg is better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是感觉有点痒。就算你的腿非常的痒，我们也不能在你的腿康复之前把你的石膏取下来啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I even held one in my hand. But it cast me out, banished me here. Guiding others to a treasure I cannot possess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 甚至曾把一个攥在手里过。但它把我流放到这里。指引别人寻找我无法拥有的珍宝。

yingyinNormal.en: We've done our part and we've been cast aside. We can be anyone. We can do anything. It's only a matter of going.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们已经完成了任务，却被抛弃，我们可以是任何人，做任何想做的事，这只取决于你是走是留。

yingyinNormal.en: Say, buddy, not to cast aspersions on your survival instincts or nothing, but haven't mammoths pretty much gone extinct?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要用你的生存本能妖言惑众，不过长毛象不是快绝种了吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Three were given to members of the cast. The rest were destroyed. Except one. One was stolen. Gentlemen, this is the one ring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 三枚送给了剧中演员，剩下的都被销毁了，除了一枚，被偷的一枚。先生们，这就是至尊魔戒。

yingyinNormal.en: That koala's a fool, Sherry-Anne. You are going to be a star one day! Auditions are over, pal. Show's already been cast. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个考拉是个蠢货，宝贝。早晚有一天你会成明星的。你来晚了，伙计，名单已经宣布了。好的……

yingyinNormal.en: Riley, you get this cast of characters in life, okay? You get friends and you get family, and they help you make it through the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱丽，你要注意你生命中的角色 好吗？你有朋友和家庭，他们帮你度过一天又一天。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: shape (metal or other material) by pouring it into a mold while molten

examination_example.sentence: Eight monumental curving staircases of granite with over 4,000 individually <highlight>cast</highlight> bronze balusters are capped by four skylight domes and two stained glass rotundas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 八个不朽的弯曲的花岗岩楼梯，有超过4000个单独铸造的青铜栏杆，由四个天窗圆顶和两个彩色玻璃圆顶盖住。

examination_example.sentence: Almost all of the interior detail is of <highlight>cast</highlight> iron or plaster; the use of wood was minimized to insure fire safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几乎所有的内部细节都是由铸铁或石膏制成的；为了确保消防安全，尽量减少了木材的使用。

examination_example.sentence: According to Paragraphs 1 and 2, many young Americans <highlight>cast</highlight> doubts on social media as a reliable source of news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据第1和第2段，许多美国年轻人对社交媒体作为可靠的新闻来源表示怀疑。

examination_example.sentence: History has never <highlight>cast</highlight> doubt on them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历史从来没有怀疑过他们。

sense_info_list.en: send light or shadow in a particular direction
assign parts in a play, film or other production
the actors in a film, play, or show
throw something forcefully in a specified direction

word_usage.usage:
cast可表示“投射，加......于”，多用于光、影、视线等。例：
The ship's sail cast a shadow on the water.
船帆在水面上投下一片影子。

cast还用于比喻，可接注意力、责任等抽象名词，多与on连用。例：
They cast doubt on the theory.
他们对该理论产生怀疑。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 演员阵容; 全体演员

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 猛扔；掷；投；抛；投射；抛弃；浇铸；转向；给…分配角色；铸造

sense_info_list.en: throw something forcefully in a specified direction

examination_example.sentence: If Paris was <highlight>cast</highlight> aside, the tradition of beauty was also to some degree slighted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果把巴黎抛在一边，美的传统也会在某种程度上被淡化。

examination_example.sentence: Becoming separated from the tribe—or worse, being <highlight>cast</highlight> out—was a death sentence."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与部落分离——或者更糟的是，被驱逐——无异于被判了死刑。

examination_example.sentence: Schellenberg took that news in stride while continuing to <highlight>cast</highlight> a skeptical eye on the research in his field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Schellenberg从容地接受了这一消息，同时继续对他所在领域的研究持怀疑态度。

sense_info_list.en: send light or shadow in a particular direction
allocate parts in (a play, film, or other production)
shape (metal or other material) by pouring it into a mold while molten
the actors in a film, play, or show
sense_info_list.zh: 演员阵容; 全体演员

通常指用力投掷, 动作迅猛, 所投掷的距离也较远。

sense_info_list.en: send light or shadow in a particular direction

examination_example.sentence: When night falls, red and blue and other colors <highlight>cast</highlight> a hazy (雾蒙蒙的) glow over a city lit up by tens of thousands of neon signs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夜幕降临，成千上万的霓虹灯牌照亮整座城市。红色，蓝色和其他颜色为这座城市蒙上一层朦胧的微光。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cast</highlight> of Characters: Narrator, Kayla, Ms. Lee, Zack
examination_example.sentence_trans: 角色阵容：叙述者, 凯拉, 李女士, 扎克
